#summary Release notes

Release Notes for My Tracks version 1.1.14
  * Add a search function to search for tracks and waypoints
  * Display date and time using the phone's format
  * Add ISO 8601 date format as an option for the default track name in
    Settings->Recording->Track name
  * Add support for ANT+ cadence profile
  * Improve the file name format when saving a track to the SD card
  * Improve the code for sending a track to Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables, and Google Docs
